(die verloren van finalisten) krijgen he: (who lost to finalists) get a second chance.
(voor nieuw toernooi of bij problemen): (for new tournament or in case of problems)
* Alleen naam is verplicht. Vul de rest: * Only name is required. Fill in the rest later before registration closes.
1. Open de JudoToernooi app op je laptop: 1. Open the JudoToernooi app on your laptop
2. Verbind de tablets met de laptop: 2. Connect the tablets to the laptop
Activeer online betalingen via iDEAL. Co: Activate online payments via iDEAL. Coaches must pay first before judokas are officially registered.
Alfabetisch per blok, met invulvak: Alphabetical per block, with fill-in field
Alleen de organisator of sitebeheerder k: Only the organizer or site administrator can close this tournament.
Alleen mutaties - Budoscholen kunnen wij: Changes only - Martial arts schools can edit, not register
Alleen nodig als de laptop geen recente: Only needed if the laptop has no recent data.
Alleen uitvoeren als internet uitvalt ti: Only execute when internet fails during the tournament.
Alle gegevens voor als internet uitvalt: All data for when internet fails
Alle verliezers krijgen herkansing in B-: All losers get a second chance in B-group.
Automatische indeling op basis van leeft: Automatic classification based on age, weight and belt. Fair pools at the push of a button.
Beheer alle organisatoren en hun gegeven: Manage all organizers and their data
Bent u coach en heeft u een link ontvang: Are you a coach and have you received a link? Use the link from the invitation to register your judokas.
Bepaal de volgorde van wedstrijden per p: Determine the match order per pool size. Drag matches to adjust the order.
Bepaal hoe judoka's in het systeem komen: Determine how judokas enter the system and what martial arts schools can do via the portal.
Bepaalt hoe judoka's worden gesorteerd v: Determines how judokas are sorted before being distributed across pools.
Bewaar deze bestanden op een USB-stick é: Save these files on a USB stick and on the laptop you bring.
Bij \"Uit\" of \"Alleen mutaties\" regel: With "Off" or "Changes only" you handle payment externally.
Bij de import zijn er problemen gedetect: Problems were detected during import. Adjust the data and save to resolve the issues.
Bij sommige categorieën wordt er met eli: Some categories use elimination instead of pools.
BIJ STORING: OVERSTAPPEN NAAR LOKALE SER: IN CASE OF FAILURE: SWITCH TO LOCAL SERVER
Bij [5, 4, 6, 3] krijg je liever 3 poule: With [5, 4, 6, 3] you'd rather have 3 pools of 4 than 2 pools of 6.
Budoscholen kunnen hun judoka's altijd b: Martial arts schools can always view their judokas, regardless of this setting.
Budoscholen schrijven zelf in via het po: Martial arts schools register themselves via the portal
Clubs blijven bewaard en kunnen voor elk: Clubs are saved and can be invited for each tournament
Coaches moeten eerst uitchecken voordat: Coaches must check out first before the card can be transferred
De browser slaat automatisch uitslagen o: The browser automatically saves results in localStorage. If the server crashes but your laptop still works, you can still print the "Live match schedules" with all scores.
De inschrijving is gesloten. Je kunt gee: Registration is closed. You can no longer add or edit judokas.
De organisator beheert de inschrijvingen: The organizer manages registrations. You can view your judokas here but not modify them.
Device binding resetten? Het device moet: Reset device binding? The device will need to enter the PIN again.
De weegkaarten zijn al geprint met blokn: Weigh-in cards have already been printed with block numbers. Changes here may cause problems.
De weger ziet een countdown timer en kri: The weigher sees a countdown timer and gets a red warning when weigh-in time is over. The weigh-in is manually closed via the button in the weigh-in interface.
Deze instelling bepaalt hoe vaak de publ: This setting determines how often the public apps (Public PWA, Announcer) automatically refresh.
Deze judoka's zijn te oud of te jong voo: These judokas are too old or too young for this tournament and cannot be registered.
Deze PIN geeft toegang om judoka's aan t: This PIN provides access to register and edit judokas. Do not share this code with others and keep it safe.
Deze toernooien hebben geen gekoppelde k: These tournaments have no linked customer - possibly legacy data
Dit blok toont automatisch de toernooi i: This block automatically shows tournament information (date, location, schedule) from settings.
Dit doet de reset:: This is what the reset does:
This applies to all your tournaments.
Dit is je vangnet bij stroomuitval, serv: This is your safety net for power outages, server crashes or internet issues. Download the most important exports before the tournament starts and save them on a USB stick or laptop.
Dit kan enkele seconden tot minuten dure: This may take a few seconds to minutes. Refresh this page to check the status.
Door het toernooi af te sluiten wordt he: Closing the tournament puts it in read-only mode.
Een template kopieert alle instellingen: A template copies all settings such as categories, weight classes and payment settings.
Er is momenteel geen actief toernooi. Ma: There is currently no active tournament. Create a new tournament to get started.
Er kunnen 2 sets weegkaarten ontstaan (o: 2 sets of weigh-in cards may be created (old vs new) → CONFUSING!
Er waren problemen bij het importeren va: There were problems importing these judokas. Check the data and adjust if necessary.

No upgrade options available. The maximum number of judokas has been reached.
Exports, backups en prints voor als het: Exports, backups and prints for when things go wrong

No category fits this judoka(s). Adjust the category settings.

Het device wordt gekoppeld bij eerste lo: The device is linked at first login - so only authorized devices can use the interface.

Je betaling wordt verwerkt. Je toernooi: Your payment is being processed. Your tournament will be automatically upgraded once payment is confirmed.

You haven't created any tournaments yet.

Je ontvangt automatisch een herinnering: You will automatically receive a reminder 3 months before next year's date.
Je toernooi :naam is succesvol geupgrade: Your tournament :naam has been successfully upgraded to the :tier tier.
Je wordt over 2 minuten automatisch uitg: You will be automatically logged out in 2 minutes due to inactivity.
Judoka's, poules en blokken zijn nu read: Judokas, pools and blocks are now read-only.
Judoka's en poule-indelingen blijven int: Judokas and pool layouts remain intact
Judoka's ingevuld, uitslagen leeg - voor: Judokas filled in, results empty - for manual entry
judoka('s) passen niet in een categorie: judoka(s) don't fit in a category

Klik om een blok toe te voegen aan de he: Click to add a block to the header
Klik op 2 aangrenzende cellen om samen t: Click on 2 adjacent cells to merge
Klik op een blok links om toe te voegen: Click a block on the left to add

After the tournament you can finalize everything here and get a complete overview of the results.

Overzicht van alle klanten (organisatore: Overview of all customers (organizers) and their tournaments
Print poule-overzichten per blok\/mat vó: Print pool overviews per block/mat before the tournament starts. Useful for distributing to table officials.
Professioneel toernooi management voor j: Professional tournament management for judo clubs. From registration to final standings, everything in one platform.
QR-codes voor snelle weging. Real-time o: QR codes for quick weigh-in. Real-time overview of who has been weighed and who still needs to.
Realtime chat tussen hoofdjury en vrijwi: Real-time chat between head referee and volunteers (mats, weigh-in, announcer, dojo).

Reset een blok naar de status aan het ei: Reset a block to its state at the end of preparation. Useful if something went wrong during match day.

Server niet bereikbaar. Je kunt nog stee: Server unreachable. You can still print from the local backup (localStorage).
Sla de huidige toernooi-instellingen op: Save the current tournament settings as a template for future tournaments.
Sleep om de volgorde aan te passen. Eers: Drag to adjust the order. First = most desired, lowest = minimum, highest = maximum.
fast during activity, slow during pause.
Sporthal WiFi + mobiele hotspot als back: Sports hall WiFi + mobile hotspot as backup

Stel de weeg- en starttijden in per blok: Set the weigh-in and start times per block. These times are shown on weigh-in cards.
Stuur elke vrijwilliger zijn\/haar eigen: Send each volunteer their own link + PIN!
Sync stuurt alleen volledige judoka's do: Sync only sends complete judokas to the organizer. After syncing you can still make changes, but then you need to sync again.
Tablets blijven op eigen WiFi, alleen br: Tablets stay on own WiFi, only source switches
Tablets blijven op eigen WiFi, geen clou: Tablets stay on own WiFi, no cloud sync
Tablets blijven op sporthal WiFi!: Tablets stay on sports hall WiFi!
Te oud\/jong voor dit toernooi. Alleen z: Too old/young for this tournament. Only visible in the club portal.

Verbinding tussen tablets en laptop (WiF: Connection between tablets and laptop (WiFi or LAN). Works without internet too!
